glsa.title: Muttprint: Insecure temporary file usage
glsa.synopsis: An insecure temporary file usage in Muttprint allows for symlink attacks.

background.p: Muttprint formats the output of mail clients to a good-looking printing using LaTeX.

description.p: Dmitry E. Oboukhov reported an insecure usage of the temporary file "/tmp/muttprint.log" in the muttprint script.

impact.p: A local attacker could perform symlink attacks to overwrite arbitrary files with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Muttprint users should upgrade to the latest version:
